PersonalStatement.text: Dakota Ward, born on 1973-08-28, is a Female based in Jonathanside, Canada. She is Divorced and holds Saudi Arabian nationality. Currently working at Young LLC.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Melton PLC from 2012 to 2020.
Senior Project Manager at Young LLC, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Swarthmore College
Master's in Engineering from King Khalid University

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys playing tennis.
